text.summary: Risk something in a dangerous situation.
text.trigger: When you attempt something risky or react under fire, envision your approach and roll.

outcomes.weakHit: You succeed, but face a troublesome cost or complication.
outcomes.miss: You fail, or a new danger is revealed. Pay the price.

text.summary: Gain leverage or prepare for what's next.
text.trigger: When you assess a situation, make preparations, or attempt to gain leverage, roll.

outcomes.strongHit: You gain advantage. Take +2 momentum or +1 on your next move.
outcomes.weakHit: Your advantage is short-lived. Take +1 momentum.
outcomes.miss: You fail or reveal a new danger. Pay the price.

text.summary: Ask questions, study a situation, or survey the surroundings.
text.trigger: When you search for clues, ask questions, or follow a track, roll.

outcomes.strongHit: You discover something helpful and specific. Take +2 momentum.
outcomes.weakHit: The information complicates your quest or introduces a new danger. Take +1 momentum.
outcomes.miss: Your investigation exposes a dire threat or reveals an unwelcome truth. Pay the price.
